name: Poda Wants a Statue
description:
Poda is angry! Poda wants a statue! 🗿🐼

Every 10 years, Poda gets really angry...
Send your bunnies to work, gather resources, upgrade everything and build an impressive statue before Poda shakes the world again!

Controls 🖱️  

Play with your mouse!

Drag and drop bunnies and resources.  
Click on upgrades to buy them.  

Music 🎵  

Check out this cute track made for the game by Zakku!  
=> Cute Working Town

Credits 👨‍👩‍👦  

Blibloop (@blibloop) - Art  
Doot (@doot) - Programming  
Zakku (@NamedZak) - Audio
